title: Detection of monkeypox virus based on a convenient and sensitive single-step RPA-CRISPR/Cas12a strategy
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14775-14783
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02049A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tao Yu, Zhen Rong, Zhixia Gu, Hongjuan Wei, Yunxiang Wang, Rui Song, Shengqi Wang, Shumei Wang
A convenient and sensitive single-step RPA-CRISPR/Cas12a assay was developed for point-of-care detection of monkeypox virus in clinical samples.
